title: PM chairs meeting of National Coordination Committee
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 03 (APP):Prime Minister Imran Khan on Friday chaired the meeting of National Coordination Committee (NCC) and discussed the situation arising in the wake of Coronavirus.
The meeting reviewed progress in controlling the spread of COVID-19 in the
country and discussed the strategy to minimize the impact of the challenge.
